name: ext-diff-rs
description: Deterministic diff + patch helpers (bytes/lines) with a stable patch_v1 format.
docs:
Deterministic diff + patch helpers (bytes/lines).

Modules:
- ext.diff.bytes
- ext.diff.lines
- ext.diff.patch_v1
- ext.diff.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-diff-rs@0.1.0 --sync
- Import ext.diff.bytes or ext.diff.lines to compute a patch.
- Import ext.diff.patch_v1 to apply a patch.

Notes:
- Determinism: pure
- Patch format: patch_v1 (stable)
